review.title: “Good people, real meritocracy”
review.pros: Pros – A great place to work for go-getters who want to succeed. Minimal red tape, bureaucracy & politics. Smart, talented, aggressive (in a good way) people. Tons of advancement opportunities - sky's the limit based on how much effort/time/energy you put into it. Great compensation if you're successful.
review.cons: Cons – Really long hours and crazy workloads can lead to burnout. Not a 40-50 hour/week place; not a lot of work/life balance.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Continue to work on work/life balance for your employees. Flexible hours/structures and enough down time is how you hang on to the good ones!
